casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

October 5, 2010

[Cite as 10105/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-4835.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-0180. In re C.B.

Cuyahoga App. No. 92775. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County. Upon consideration of the motion of Timothy R. Sterkel to withdraw as counsel,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
